author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Lists all devices in Symantec MC.
commands.name: symantec-mc-list-devices

commands.description: Gets device information from Symantec MC.
commands.name: symantec-mc-get-device

commands.description: Gets health information for a device.
commands.name: symantec-mc-get-device-health

commands.description: Gets license information for a device in Symantec MC.
commands.name: symantec-mc-get-device-license

commands.description: Gets the status of a device.
commands.name: symantec-mc-get-device-status

commands.description: Creates a policy in Symantec MC.
commands.name: symantec-mc-create-policy

commands.description: Updates the metadata for a policy in Symantec MC.
commands.name: symantec-mc-update-policy

commands.description: Deletes a policy in Symantec MC.
commands.name: symantec-mc-delete-policy

commands.description: Adds content to a policy in Symantec MC. Can be IPs, URLs, or category names.
commands.name: symantec-mc-add-policy-content

commands.description: Deletes content from a policy in Symantec MC.
commands.name: symantec-mc-delete-policy-content

commands.description: Updates content in a policy in Symantec MC.
commands.name: symantec-mc-update-policy-content

integration.description: Symantec Management Center provides a unified management environment for the Symantec Security Platform portfolio of products.
integration.name: Symantec Management Center
